text.author: P. Scott Corbett, Volker Janssen, John M. Lund, Todd Pfannestiel, Sylvie Waskiewicz, Paul Vickery
text.title: U.S. History
text.summary: This section summarizes the history of Native American civilizations before the arrival of the Spanish, including the settlement of America over the Beringia land bridge 15,000 years ago, the Olmecs on the Gulf Coast of Mexico (1200–400 BCE), and the Mayas (2000 BCE–900 CE) around Mexico, Belize, Honduras and Guatemala.
